body_html: Indeed, this is cool, but probably would be better as an external repo for now. GitHub doesn't provide great community tools for managing and supporting external code that isn't core to the codebase. Can this live on your own repo on GitHub for now?
body_text: Indeed, this is cool, but probably would be better as an external repo for now. GitHub doesn't provide great community tools for managing and supporting external code that isn't core to the codebase.  Can this live on your own repo on GitHub for now?
